Post.title: CSS Multi-column Layout(CSS)
Post._content:
CSS Columns : IE10,IE10+

More info: [CSS Columns ](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_Columns ) ``` bash . columns /* 3 30px */ . column-count /* */ . column-width /* */ . column-rule /* border */ . column-rule-width . column-rule-style . column-rule-color . column-gap /* */ . column-fill /* */ . column-span /* all, none */ column-count: column-width: -1 column-countcolumn-width columns: 120px; /* column-width: 120px; column-count: auto */ columns: auto 120px; /* column-width: 120px; column-count: auto */ columns: 2; /* column-width: auto; column-count: 2 */ columns: 2 auto; /* column-width: auto; column-count: 2 */ columns: auto; /* column-width: auto; column-count: auto */ columns: auto auto; /* column-width: auto; column-count: auto */ ``` ## (,):

``` bash //column-rule border, //column-gap 1em, font-size .css-columns3 { columns: 3; column-rule: 1px solid #23a1c9; column-gap: 50px; } .css-columns3 .columns-title { column-span: all;//column-spannoneall text-align: center; padding: .5em; } ``` ## ,:
``` bash .css-columns-vertical { margin: 0 auto; columns: 1em; width: 90%; column-rule: dashed 1px #ccc; word-wrap: break-word; text-align: center; direction: rtl; } ``` ##
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • 6
  • 7
  • 8
  • 9
``` bash .css-columns-9 { margin: 0 auto; columns: 3; width: 200px; text-align: center; border: solid 1px #23a1c9; padding: 10px 10px 0 10px; } .css-columns-9 ul { margin: 0; padding: 0; list-style: none; } .css-columns-9 li { margin-bottom: 10px; height: 50px; line-height: 50px; background: #23a1c9; color: #fff; } ``` ## :
  1. content
  2. content
  3. content
  4. content
  5. content
  6. content
  7. content
``` bash .css-columns-multiple { margin: 0 auto; columns: 90px; width: 300px; border: solid 1px #23a1c9; } ```

Post.title: CSS3nth-child(n)
Post._content:
nth-child(n)n N

## 44+1: ``` bash li:nth-child(4n+1){ clear: both ; } ``` ## ##### 3LI: ``` bash li:nth-child(3){ background:orange; } ``` ## ##### 3693LI: ``` bash li:nth-child(3n){ background:orange; } ``` ## ##### (1). 14731LI ``` bash li:nth-child(3n+1){ background:orange; } ``` ##### (2). 5811531LI ``` bash li:nth-child(3n+5){ background:orange; } ``` ##### (3). 5-1=410-1=951LI ``` bash li:nth-child(5n-1){ background:orange; } ```
Post.content:
nth-child(n)n N

44+1:

3LI:

3693LI:

(1). 14731LI
(2). 5811531LI
(3). 5-1=410-1=951LI

Post.title: git
Post._content:
## 
``` bash
git clone <url>               // 
git init                               //

```
## 
``` bash
git status                                                         //
git diff                                                               //
git add .                                                           //
git add <file>                                                 //
git add --all                                                    //
git mv <old> <new>                                    //
git rm <file>                                                   //
git rm --cached <file>                                //
git commit -m "commit message"      //
git commit --amend                                 //

```
#### 
``` bash
git status 
git pull -r                         
git add ABC-themes/abc/      //abc
git commit -m "[ABC-15] "    //
git push
```
## 
``` bash
git log                                                   //
git log -p <file>                                 //
git blame <file>                                //
```
## 
``` bash
git reset --hard HEAD                 
//,HEAD

git reset --hard                              
//,HEAD

git checkout HEAD <file>          //
git checkout -- .                           //           
git reflog                                          //
//git logcommitid; git reflogcommitid
git revert <commit>                    // 
```
#### PUSH, commit,adbe592
``` bash
git reflog
git reset adbe592
```
#### , 
``` bash
git reflog
git reset --hard 37d463236f7a8
//37d463236f7a8, 

git push origin feature/ABC-99 -f //, push <> -f,
```

#### git revert  git reset  
``` bash
git revert  commithistory
    * git revert HEAD                   commit
    * git revert HEAD^                commit
    * git revert commit fa042ce57ebbe5bb9c8db709f719cec2c58ee7ff
git revertrevert

git resetcommit,.
```


## 
``` bash
git branch                                         //
git branch -a                                    //
git branch -r | grep r126         //r126
git checkout <branch/tag>       //
git branch <new-branch>         //
git branch -d <branch>              //
git tag                                               //
git tag <tagname>                      //
git tag -d <tagname>                 //
```
#### 
``` bash
git fetch --all
git branch -r | grep ABC         //ABC
git checkout --track origin/feature/ABC-3543
```
#### ABC-2:
``` bash
git stash
git fetch
git branch -D ABC-2
git checkout ABC-2
git stash pop
```

#### develop
``` bash
git checkout develop//git checkout origin/developgit checkout develop
```

## 
``` bash
git merge <branch>              //
git rebase  <branch>            //
```
#### supportmerge ABC-2739
``` bash
git checkout origin/support
git merge origin/ABC-2739
git push
```

#### git rebase git merge
``` bash
git pull -r                   //rebasemaster
git checkout origin/dev  //rebasedev
git rebase master //git add . git rebase --continue
mastergit merge dev
```
#### , :
``` bash
git stash
git log
git rebase -i HEAD~7 //7 commit,
//git checkout themes/abc/css/
git rebase --continue  //"git add "
git rebase --abort  //rebase
git stash pop
```
#### PUSH,add
``` bash
1.
git rebase --abort  //rebase
git reset --soft d688f04  //commitindex filecommit
git stash
git status
git pull --rebase

2.
git reset --hard HEAD~  // HEAD
git reset --soft HEAD^//commit

git status
git rebase --continue  //"git add "
git branch --all  //
git rebase --abort   //rebase
git pull --rebase
```

## 
``` bash
git remote -v                                              //
git remote show <remote>                  //
git remote add <remote> <url           //
git fetch  <remote>                                //
git fetch -p                                                //
git pull  <remote> <branch>              //git pull -r
git push  <remote> <branch>            //
git push  <remote> : <branch/tag-name>     //
git push --tags                                        //

```
##  gitUbuntuPPAGit
``` bash
1. sudo add-apt-repository ppa:git-core/ppa
2. sudo apt update 
3. apt install git

```
## 
``` bash
git stash                                        //
git stash pop                             //,stash
```
#### stash,{}{1}{2}stash
``` bash
git stash
git stash list 								  //
git stash apply stash@{0}    //0,1,2...
```

## 
``` bash
git checkout -- .//
git reset --hard //
git clean -df //
git stash clear //stash
git stash//
git stash pop//

git pull = git fetch + git merge FETCH_HEAD 
git pull --rebase =  git fetch + git rebase FETCH_HEAD 

ssh-key: 
1. cd ~/.ssh/
2. ls
3. vim id_rsacode id_rsa

ssh-keygen -t rsa -f github -C ""   //ssh-key
```

Post.title: hexo-world
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start
``` bash
npm install npm install -g hexo  //hexo
hexo server  //
//, http://localhost:4000localhost 
//hexo server -p 50005000 http://localhost:5000
```
More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)


## 
``` bash
_config.yml:
deploy:
  type:
git repo: https://xmh.com/my/my.io.git/  //
branch: master  //
```
## git.
``` bash
npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
```


## 
``` bash
hexo new "My New Post"
hexo new post CSS-ie6
hexo new page CSS3-Grid.md
```
## 
``` bash
:hexo\source\_posts
:CSS-ie6.md
```
More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

## 
``` bash
hexo publish [layout] <filename>
```
## 
``` bash
hexo g
```
More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

## 

``` bash
hexo d
//: ERROR Deployer not found: git
//git: npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
//, hexo g, 
```
More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

## 
``` bash
hexo clean
```
Post.raw:
---
title: hexo-world
date: 2019-03-01
updated: 2020-04-19
tags:
			- hexo
---
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start
``` bash
npm install npm install -g hexo  //hexo
hexo server  //
//, http://localhost:4000localhost 
//hexo server -p 50005000 http://localhost:5000
```
More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)


## 
``` bash
_config.yml:
deploy:
  type:
git repo: https://xmh.com/my/my.io.git/  //
branch: master  //
```
## git.
``` bash
npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
```


## 
``` bash
hexo new "My New Post"
hexo new post CSS-ie6
hexo new page CSS3-Grid.md
```
## 
``` bash
:hexo\source\_posts
:CSS-ie6.md
```
More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

## 
``` bash
hexo publish [layout] <filename>
```
## 
``` bash
hexo g
```
More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

## 

``` bash
hexo d
//: ERROR Deployer not found: git
//git: npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
//, hexo g, 
```
More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

## 
``` bash
hexo clean
```
